    Class provides the graphical user interface for the game.

      • gameOverDialog

        public void gameOverDialog(int score)
        Shows an end game dialog which displays score and asks if player wants a new game or not.
        Parameters:

        public void reDraw()
        Repaints the GameBoard and ScorePanel. Called after each move and when starting a new game.
